languages.text: "Я вовсе не!.." {n}Ирлиэт гневно поджимает губы, затем делает глубокий вдох, выдох, снова вдох — и раздражение в ее взгляде сменяется холодом.{/n} "Медитировать в присутствии мон-кай было опрометчивым решением — и то подтверждает твоя реакция".

"Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."
languages.original_text: "Я вовсе не!.." {n}Ирлиэт гневно поджимает губы, затем делает глубокий вдох, выдох, снова вдох — и раздражение в ее взгляде сменяется холодом.{/n} "Медитировать в присутствии мон-кай было опрометчивым решением — и то подтверждает твоя реакция".

traits.locale_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡Lo dudo mucho!». {n}Yrliet aprieta los labios enfurecida, luego inspira profundamente, exhala, vuelve a inspirar... y la frustración de su mirada deja paso a su habitual frialdad.{/n} «Debí imaginar que meditar en presencia de mon-keigh era un error; tu reacción no ha hecho más que confirmarlo».
languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo dudo mucho!». {n}Yrliet aprieta los labios enfurecida, luego inspira profundamente, exhala, vuelve a inspirar... y la frustración de su mirada deja paso a su habitual frialdad.{/n} «Debí imaginar que meditar en presencia de mon-keigh era un error; tu reacción no ha hecho más que confirmarlo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「失礼な！」{n}ユリエットは怒りで口をつぐみ、何度も深呼吸を繰り返す。彼女の視線から苛立ちが消え失せ、冷徹さが宿った。{/n}「モン＝ケイのいる環境で瞑想をするのは賢明ではなかった。その反応を見れば明らかだ」
languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

traits.locale_text: 「失礼な！」{n}ユリエットは怒りで口をつぐみ、何度も深呼吸を繰り返す。彼女の視線から苛立ちが消え失せ、冷徹さが宿った。{/n}「モン＝ケイのいる環境で瞑想をするのは賢明ではなかった。その反応を見れば明らかだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “根本不是！”{n}伊莉耶特愤怒地抿紧嘴唇，之后深吸一口气，呼出，吸入……随后，她眼中的愤怒变成了冰冷的寒意。{/n}“在猴子面前冥想不是明智的行为，你的反应越发证实了这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

traits.locale_text: “根本不是！”{n}伊莉耶特愤怒地抿紧嘴唇，之后深吸一口气，呼出，吸入……随后，她眼中的愤怒变成了冰冷的寒意。{/n}“在猴子面前冥想不是明智的行为，你的反应越发证实了这一点。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Pas du tout ! » {n}Yrliet serre les lèvres de colère, puis prend une profonde inspiration, expire et inspire à nouveau... L'irritation de son regard cède alors la place à une froideur glaciale.{/n} « Votre réaction confirme qu'il n'était guère judicieux de méditer en présence de mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

traits.locale_text: « Pas du tout ! » {n}Yrliet serre les lèvres de colère, puis prend une profonde inspiration, expire et inspire à nouveau... L'irritation de son regard cède alors la place à une froideur glaciale.{/n} « Votre réaction confirme qu'il n'était guère judicieux de méditer en présence de mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wohl kaum!" {n}Yrliet presst verärgert ihre Lippen zusammen. Dann atmet sie tief ein, aus, wieder ein — und die Gereiztheit in ihrem Blick weicht einer eisigen Kälte.{/n} "Im Beisein eines Chem-Pan-Sey zu meditieren, war unklug. Eure Reaktion bestätigt das nur."
languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

traits.locale_text: "Wohlh kaum!" {n}Yrliet presst verärgert ihre Lippen zusammen. Dann atmet sie tief ein, aus, wieder ein — und die Gereiztheit in ihrem Blick weicht einer eisigen Kälte.{/n} "Im Beisein eines Chem-Pan-Sey zu meditieren, war unklug. Eure Reaktion bestätigt das nur."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

languages.text: "Hiç de bile!" {n}Yrliet, öfkeyle dudaklarını bastırıyor. Ardından derin bir nefes alıp veriyor, tekrar nefes alıyor ve... Bakışlarındaki rahatsızlığın yerini kayıtsızlık alıyor.{/n} "Mon-keighlerin huzurunda meditasyon yapmak hiç akıllıca değilmiş. Tepkinden de anlaşılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Hardly!" {n}Yrliet presses her lips together in anger, then takes a deep breath, exhales, inhales again — and coldness replaces the irritation in her gaze.{/n} "Meditating in the presence of mon-keigh was unwise — your reaction only confirms it."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç de bile!" {n}Yrliet, öfkeyle dudaklarını bastırıyor. Ardından derin bir nefes alıp veriyor, tekrar nefes alıyor ve... Bakışlarındaki rahatsızlığın yerini kayıtsızlık alıyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh'in huzurunda meditasyon yapmak hiç akıllıca değilmiş. Tepkinden de anlaşılıyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
